attributes.action: Resulution of Kirklees Council 2022/48/93248/W by HOC upon our peers judgment
attributes.additional_details: You disarm me by limiting this form's characters but the legal basis of this is in the Justices of the peace act 1997 & carried over to the Courts act 2003 & IS in fact the right to petition basis of appeal itself. Every commission of council chairman who makes any order or instrument does so as a Justice of the Peace. Synonymous with chairman of a commission. Notify Kirklees Council to annul the statutory instrument immediately now, pending 6 month run of this petition to collect peer Judgment.
attributes.background:
We seek a resolution to the tree removal etc

https://www.kirklees.gov.uk/beta/planning-applications/search-for-planning-applications/detail.aspx?id=2022/93248
A statutory instrument containing any* procedure rules is subject to annulment in pursuance of resolution by either Houses of Parliament

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
